details.description: A personalized product recommendation platform where users can submit queries, receive suggestions, and interact with other users' recommendations. Built with authentication, private routes, and dynamic UI.
challenges: Implementing secure JWT authentication with Firebase login.
Designing a dynamic recommendation feed system and protected routes.
improvements: Introduce search and filtering for better UX.

details.description: A local hobby group management platform that lets users create, join, and manage groups. Includes a dashboard, charts, role-based features, and public group listings.
challenges: Designing a clean dashboard with Recharts analytics.
Implementing sorting/filtering logic for group discovery.
improvements: Implement group event scheduling with reminders.

details.description: A modern app discovery platform simulating an App Store experience with categorized apps, user authentication, and a stylish UI/UX.
challenges: Maintaining responsive UI across all devices.
Creating a seamless app detail routing system.
improvements: Enable backend integration for app submission.
